website_summaries.verdict: Long-time family favorite that kids think is candy.
pros: Kids give these an A+ for taste and chewiness
Free of most allergens including eggs, dairy and fish
cons: High in sugar and lacking iron

customer_reviews.title: Not good for your children's teeth!!!
customer_reviews.text: According to our dentist these gummies could very well be responsible for my daughter's tooth decays which came out nowhere and rapidly grew. We were told that for children whose teeth are prone to cavities these vitamins are not recommended. We made a huge mistake with starting our daughter to these vitamins and now we have to deal with not only two cavities but also one baby root canal. If you still choose to use these vitamins, our dentist told us, they are better if used in the morning and immediately followed by brushing. They are extremely sticky and not good for children's teeth. I wish we had known this before.
customer_reviews.author: GreenistheBest

customer_reviews.title: Hard to chew and can lead to cavities 🦷
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my sisters children. And this is what she had to say regarding them: Cons: - very hard to chew - children should brush teeth afterwards as they could cause cavities - has gelatin (she wanted something without gelatin) Pros: - the only way her children would have multivitamin I would suggest looking for some other multivitamins which are easy to chew for kids. Also check them with ur kids dentist before using as many such products are known to cause cavities!
customer_reviews.author: Javeria

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend for children
customer_reviews.text: Could not even use these for my daughter who is 2.5 years old, gummies are so tough she could not chew them. I could not even chew them myself! Definitely not the soft gummies we are used to. Would not recommend for children. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: contains no FD&C coloring
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in the past until I found out it contained FD&C coloring so I ended up buying a natural multivitamin. The price of that shot up so I thought I'd give these a try and I have to say I’m so glad they took that coloring out of these. My kids love them; they think they're eating regular gummies!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: A safe way to get nutrients
customer_reviews.text: Baby likes these, after she stopped taking the prescription it was my best option. Doesn't have the flourine, iron, or calcium of the prescription, but god forbid she eats a pile of these, she'll be okay
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Very chewy
customer_reviews.text: These vitamins are extremely chewy and hard for my 2 year old to chew up. Other gummy vitamins are easier to chew.
customer_reviews.author: bm00k

customer_reviews.title: Boost your childs immune system!
customer_reviews.text: You get many many vitamins for a low cost. My daughter loves these. She takes one a day but she often sneeks another, I dont mind cause her recommended dose is two a day. We take our vitamins together in the morning. The values of each vitamin are great and I have peace of mind. It's December, 4 months since the beginning of school, and my daughter hasnt gotten sick once! (Knock on wood)
customer_reviews.author: Alivea

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: so it's being a few months using this and my son hasn't caught a cold since then. my son usually would have regular colds he is way better and haven't being sick since using these. It arrived on time and package very nice my son has started them and so far so good I will update on how well it works for his immune system as that's the main reason I bought them. My update: so it has being a few week my son has being taking these and he usually has the cold often well not anymore this product deserves 10 stars
customer_reviews.author: kari

customer_reviews.title: Still great after all these years.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter disliked every gummie vitamin we tried, then I found these. I thought how amazing it would be to have my daughter take the same vitamins I took 45 years earlier. She likes them a lot and it's no longer an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Maleson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my niece's, got me 5 bottles of this vitamins all the way to Peru, they love it, I have noticed that they have more appetit as well which I don't know if that's what it's for, they are more energetic and they look healthier. I recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Esther Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: seems like a good vitamin for my kiddo
customer_reviews.text: Everything was good except they arrived on a really hot day, they even put an ice pack in so that they wouldn't melt but they kinda all got stuck together anyway. but without the ice pack they definitely would have been melted, I didn't even think about that so it was nice of them.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: When your child won't go for the fancy stuff, they'll go for this.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all the fancy vitamins, but this is the only thing my child will take. As much as I'd love to get some Omega in my kid, the pediatrician swears this stuff is what she needs!
customer_reviews.author: A.B.

customer_reviews.title: Tough to chew
customer_reviews.text: I like the big bottle of these, but these are TOUGH to chew. They’re VERY firm, and the taste is meh. My daughter doesn’t really mind but even she commented on how hard they were. Not expired either, so I guess that’s just the way they make them.
customer_reviews.author: Sara7787

customer_reviews.title: Family tradition
customer_reviews.text: My father used give my brothers and I this vitamins, so now I am a mom of a 2 year old boy and here we are, I trust this product. You should too.
customer_reviews.author: Heidy Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I both take these every day. They taste much better to me than the chalky kind. The price is super reasonable too compared to other stores I’ve bought them in.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: The only vitamins my son will take taste great and worked for me while I was pregnant
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Cosklo

customer_reviews.title: Take 2 everyday.
customer_reviews.text: My husband broke his C 2 in neck, I gave him 3 a day and he recovered faster than anyone expected. Not saying it will be this for everyone but can say it won't hurt. Still taking even 9years later.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: One Big Glob.
customer_reviews.text: Mine was all melted into one big glob. I was trying to get a refund, but it still asked for me to send the product back. I see absolutely no point in sending it back so I'll just leave review. Huge waste of time and money. Don't order this product if you live in a hot place or cannot get to your package within a quick amount of time..
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Careful what time of year you order these :(
customer_reviews.text: I hate to say anything bad about these, but.....I guess warm weather is not a good time to order gummies. When they arrived; it was ONE BIG gummie / conglomerate vitamin all melted together :(
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Very kid friendly
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is good. And it makes bring healthy very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Personal

customer_reviews.title: Great daily multivitamin
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's take this daily and I have seen a difference in the frequency of colds. Would definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: New packaging seems extremely unnecessary. Daughter likes these and I use them as treats for good behavior sometimes!

customer_reviews.title: kids love them
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. plus the kids just love to eat the vitamins

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. my daughter loves them and its a big bottle. the last time i got these from riteaid for the same price for a small bottle. def will buy againz

customer_reviews.title: Passed the 9 year old's test with 5 stars and a GREAT deal!!
customer_reviews.text: My son (9 yrs old) doesn't have the best appetite, so it is really important for him to take multivitamins. He would not take the chew-able ones at all, said they were disgusting. Because of that he was hesitant about these. He skeptically tried one and it passed the test with flying colors. He then took the 2nd one and said he wished he could have more. This is a BIG jar too. At two a day, it is going to last us 3 months. At 12 dollars and some change, you really can't beat that deal and the health benefits he is gong to gain from it.
customer_reviews.author: Radmom

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and she feels great with these, a must for any kid to cover the corners that your everyday meals don’t

customer_reviews.title: famous in China
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my friends and children. It's said that it's quite famous in China. I don't know how it works.

customer_reviews.title: Wish they could make vitamins that taste great
customer_reviews.text: These taste better than other brands we’ve tried, but the kids still hate the taste, so it’s still a struggle every night to get them to take their vitamins.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great way for my nephew to take his vitamins. Would recommend.

customer_reviews.title: best for kids!
customer_reviews.text: had to purchase online because I couldn't find in store. have always used the vitamins and have not be dis-appointed.

customer_reviews.title: A superior consistency compared to the competition.
customer_reviews.text: Compared with other multivitamin gummies I've gotten for my kids, these ones definitely have more consistency and don't tend to get stuck together (even here in the humid tropics) as other brands. They're more expensive than the other brands I've bought, but I'm glad I got them.

customer_reviews.title: Great- using for over a year now!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love this one and I must say it reminds me of when I was a little girl- old habits sticks! :)

customer_reviews.title: But I should deduct a star since they’re not as great as the kind we had in my day that ...

customer_reviews.title: All glued together
customer_reviews.text: I can’t return these because we bought them in August as a subscribe and save and stored them in a cool dry space. Our son finished his other vitamins and opened them tonight. They are all stuck together in a giant ball and are unusable. Need to throw them away. Please buy vitamins on line with caution.

customer_reviews.title: Kid approved

customer_reviews.title: Melted upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: The first shipment was fine and I signed up for automatic shipment. Then my second shipment came and all the gummies had melted together in a pool. I canceled the subscription. Probably would be OK during cooler months.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, like it is on sub and save
customer_reviews.text: Great product. My kids like it. Love that I can get it through subscribe and save.

customer_reviews.title: Picky kid loves these
customer_reviews.text: My son is pretty picky about everything. I've bought vitamins before that he won't eat. He likes these, although he won't eat the orange ones. That's okay, I eat them.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to chew
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite. Maybe they were not too fresh because they are extremely hard to chew. We started buying different brand.

customer_reviews.title: These are the only vitamins my kids will happily eat. I've never tasted it myself

I had to try it as she would always complain when she gets it and even for me it was a lot of work. I will return for a refund. Something is definitely wrong with this one

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with corn syrup allergy
customer_reviews.text: The multi vitamins are non GMO and no corn syrup. My grand son is allergic to corn and corn syrup products. He has had no reaction the these vitamins. A relief.

customer_reviews.title: Our 2 year old loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter barely eats any vegetables. We tried other multivitamins to ensure she’s covered on her essential vitamins and minerals and she wouldn’t even touch them, but these she begs for more of each day. (Obviously we only give the daily serving size to her)

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these and takes them without fuss.
customer_reviews.text: Let me clarify, I don't love these, my daughter does. She does not mind having two - the listed dose on the bottle. She says they taste fine and will take them daily with out any fuss. I choose four stars because they have to take two gummies a day but that is a fair trade off IF this is what the manufactures due to maintain the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Davis

customer_reviews.title: Smell funny, throwing away
customer_reviews.text: I have bought them before, but this time they smell very funny, I am throwing them away. Waste of money.

product_meta.title: Flintstones Gummies Kids Vitamins, Gummy Multivitamin for Kids and Toddlers with Vitamins A, B6, B12, C, E, Zinc & more, 180ct
product_meta.description: Style:180ct BottleTrusted by parents and pediatricians alike, Flintstones multivitamins have been providing kids nutritional support as they grow up healthy and strong for more than 50 years. Flintstones Complete Multivitamin Gummies offer a wide range of nutrients in easy-to-chew, fruit-flavored gummies that kids love. These daily multivitamins provide vitamins and minerals that growing bodies may need. Flintstones Gummies have key nutrients that support physical energy by helping convert food to fuel, while also supporting bone health, immune health, and eye health in a fun gummy.* Flintstones Complete Gummies come in classic Flintstones characters and in tasty flavors like cherry, orange, and raspberry. *This statement has not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. The Supplement Facts labeling information contained within this website should be regarded as the most up to date and may differ from product labeling that you have purchased. Please consult your product package for information, including allergens, specific to the product you have purchased.
feature_bullets: Flintstones Complete Gummies Multivitamins provide toddlers, children and teens with complete nutritional support in easy to chew, fruit flavored gummy vitamins
Free of: Aspartame, High Fructose Corn Syrup, and Dairy (Milk), Fish/Crustacean Shellfish and Egg allergen
Directions: Under adult supervision, product should be fully chewed Children 2 & 3 years of age: Fully chew one gummy daily Adults and children 4 years of age and older: Fully chew two gummies daily
Contains 11 Key Nutrients: Vitamin A, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B12, Vitamin C, Vitamin D, Vitamin E, Folic Acid, Iodine, Pantothenic Acid, Zinc, Biotin
Nutritional support you can trust to help kids thrive Flintstones Vitamins are the #1 pediatrician recommended children's multivitamin brand

Flintstones Vitamins are compliant with the new FDA labeling regulations You may see products that have both the original and new supplement facts labels Flintstones Vitamins will continue to offer nutritional support for the fast-moving kids of today
